topics.body:
Watched about 5 episodes of Jojo's bizzare adventure.

First reaction: It's okay, Dio is catoonishly evil. Did his dad just beat him with broken bottles or something. ...Actually he probably did.

Then I got episode 5. By this point I was unsure how I felt. It felt like generic shounen fighting story, but I kept watching. And then I realized something. I was watching DragonBall Z, but without the annoying issue of the going "OH MY LORD JUST SHUT UP AND PUNCH EACHOTHER ALREADY"

They...they didn't stand around and yammer. They...PUNCHED EACHOTHER!

*choir of angels sings*

Long story short: I think I like it. I've heard it gets better as it goes on too.
